content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":93689,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bb6acd14-f882-4fd1-b804-f27c6b12c002/Final.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bb6acd14-f882-4fd1-b804-f27c6b12c002/Final.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Final.png\",\"name\":\"Final.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bb6acd14-f882-4fd1-b804-f27c6b12c002\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":606,\"height\":341},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Being a people manager is quite challenging but rewarding opportunity. Understanding and respecting managerial responsibilities puts you in a great position to grow your own career and to help your employees enhance theirs. Here at EPAM we know that leading by example is key to managing and retaining talents. When you lead by example, you can create a workplace that's full of trust, confidence and common purpose.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM managers can use powerful tools, as well as companyâ€™s guidance and support, to improve resource optimization, spot and resolve resource conflicts, manage a resource pool of diverse talents and simulate plan alternatives to find the best path forward for the benefit of our employees and EPAM.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We salute you, the Resource Manager, and we are excited for you and your new chapter in your journey at EPAM!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
